description:
Yuina, who works in the Royal Palace, is an 18-year-old hopeless romantic always dreaming and yearning of falling in love. Perhaps someday, she can meet someone special, fall in love, have a wonderful relationship, and eventually get married. 

One fateful day, she met Terriol Hagen, the Crown Prince’s knight, and fell in love at first sight. By the work of fate, they became lovers. However, because of the rigorous demands of Terriol's job, their relationship didn’t progress smoothly——.

Part 2 of the Lucott Kingdom series.>
